translation.en: Dear Diary...
go fuck yourself.
Just kidding. I don't know what to write in this stupid thing.
translation.fr: Je blague. Je ne sais pas quoi écrire dans ce fichu carnet.

translation.en: Anyway, hi.
My name is Sydney.
I'm a boring 17- year- old white girl.
translation.fr: Je suis une fille sans intérêt de 17 ans.

translation.en: I'm not special, is what I'm trying to say,
and I'm okay with that.
- ♪ I'm not like everybody else ♪ - We moved to Pennsylvania two years ago.
translation.fr: On a emménagé en Pennsylvanie il y a deux ans.

translation.en: And not, like, a cute part of Pennsylvania either,
translation.fr: Pas dans un coin sympa de Pennsylvanie.

translation.en: but corn and cabbage and shit.
Like, my town's won the grand prize for most polluted air in America
translation.fr: Ma ville a remporté le prix du bled le plus pollué,

translation.en: for a bunch of years in a row now, so...
- ♪ 'Cause I'm not like everybody else ♪ - ...yippee.
Ms. Cappriotti made me promise to do this.
translation.fr: Mme Cappriotti m'a fait promettre d'écrire.

translation.en: Promise you'll do this.
She said it might help with my moods.
translation.fr: Elle dit que ça devrait m'aider.

translation.en: It might help with your moods.
I keep losing my temper.
- ♪ Like everybody else ♪ - I don't want to, but it just spills out.
translation.fr: Et je ne me contrôle plus.

translation.en: It's 'cause my dad sort of died... last spring.
translation.fr: Disons que mon père est mort au printemps dernier.

translation.en: So I'm supposed to write... what, now? I don't get it.
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que je dois écrire là-dedans ?

translation.en: Anything. Everything.
translation.fr: N'importe quoi. Ce que tu veux.

translation.en: Whatever comes to mind.
translation.fr: Ce qui te passe par la tête.

translation.en: And now no one knows what to say to me.
translation.fr: Personne ne sait quoi me dire.

translation.en: Think of it like you're just talking to yourself
translation.fr: Comme si tu te parlais à toi-même

translation.en: and no one will ever read it but you.
translation.fr: et que tu étais la seule à le lire.

translation.en: Not even the guidance counselor.
translation.fr: Pas même la psy du lycée.

translation.en: Can I just...
use my phone?
Hmm... Your phone'll be distracting. Don't you think?
translation.fr: C'est une source de distraction. Tu ne crois pas ?

translation.en: I'd like you to have something a little more...
translation.fr: J'aimerais que ce soit un peu plus...

translation.en: therapeutic.
These things are never easy,
but I do want you to at least attempt
translation.fr: mais j'aimerais que tu essaies au moins

translation.en: to have a normal high school experience.
translation.fr: d'avoir une expérience normale du lycée.

translation.en: I mean, she's pretty all right, I guess.
Even if she does smell like an old hippie.
translation.fr: Même si elle sent la vieille hippie.

translation.en: Anyway, here's to a normal high school experience,
translation.fr: Bref, voici une expérience normale du lycée.

translation.en: whatever the fuck that means.
And yes, during arousal, there is an increase in all sorts of things,
translation.fr: En phase d'excitation, il y a une augmentation importante

translation.en: including adrenaline and, of course, blood flow,
translation.fr: de l'adrénaline et bien sûr, du flux sanguin.

translation.en: and the blood flow continues down
and then gets trapped within the corpora cavernosa.
translation.fr: et se retrouve piégé dans les corps caverneux.

translation.en: The penis expands, and this is how the Homo sapien male
translation.fr: Le pénis grossit et voilà comment l'Homo sapiens

translation.en: is able to hold an erection.
Yes.
From my experience, Mr. File,
the holding of an erection is far more successful
translation.fr: la tenue de l'érection est meilleure

translation.en: in the hands of a Homo sapien female.
translation.fr: entre les mains d'une Homo sapiens.

translation.en: Very funny, Mr. Lewis.
Just talkin' science.
Moving on.
When a female gets sexually excited,
there is also increased blood flow
translation.fr: les organes génitaux se gonflent de sang.

translation.en: - to the genitals... - Ah. Oh, come on, fire crotch.
translation.fr: les organes génitaux se gonflent de sang. Allez, cramouille rousse, rigole. C'était drôle.

translation.en: - Laugh. That was funny. - ...proceeds to swell.
translation.fr: Allez, cramouille rousse, rigole. C'était drôle.

translation.en: Why is all this happening?
- - Your scrotum looks different than others.
That's an asymmetrical scrotum.
- My best friend is Dina. - Having one is not at all unusual.
She's such a badass.
Normally, I don't think she'd choose me as a friend,
translation.fr: Elle ne m'aurait pas choisie comme amie,

translation.en: but we both moved here around the same time.
translation.fr: mais on a emménagé en même temps.

translation.en: Both the new kids in town, you know, so, guess I kinda lucked out.
translation.fr: On était les deux petites nouvelles, alors j'ai eu du bol.

translation.en: Before Dina, I mostly just kept to myself.
translation.fr: Avant de la connaître, je restais toute seule.

translation.en: I'm not the kind of person that likes attention, really,
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas du genre à aimer attirer l'attention,

translation.en: but she has this way about her that...
she just makes me feel different.
She was with me when I found out about my dad.
translation.fr: Elle était là quand j'ai su pour mon père.

translation.en: Okay. You ready?
- She held my hand. - One, two...
We cried.
And now, since then, she keeps me laughing
translation.fr: Depuis ce jour-là, elle me fait rire,

translation.en: when all I wanna do is melt into the floor.
translation.fr: alors que j'ai juste envie de disparaître.

translation.en: Which sort of made me realize I've never had a best friend before.
translation.fr: C'est là que j'ai compris que je n'avais jamais eu de meilleure amie.

translation.en: So, I'm standing there, trying to get by, and he's all like,
translation.fr: J'étais plantée là, je me donnais un genre et il me sort :

translation.en: Oh, who's the new girl in town? And I'm like, Shut up. It's me, Dina.
translation.fr: C'est qui cette nouvelle ? Moi : Ta gueule, c'est moi, Dina.

translation.en: Wait, this is Brad... Lewis?
translation.fr: Attends, tu parles de Brad Lewis ?

translation.en: Yeah.
He's sort of sweet, you know?
And then he asked me to homecoming.
translation.fr: Il m'a invitée au bal du lycée.

translation.en: Wait, and... and you accepted?
No. I told him to take his washboard abs and chiseled jawline
translation.fr: Je lui ai dit de reprendre ses abdos et sa belle gueule

translation.en: and get out of my face.
Yeah, of course I said yes.
Uh-- Oh, my God. You had sex with him, didn't you?
- - Holy shit.
No way! Holy shit!
You gave Bradley Lewis your V- card?
translation.fr: Tu t'es fait baiser par Bradley Lewis ?

translation.en: - Tell me he used a condom, because-- - Yes, of course.
translation.fr: - Il a utilisé une capote, j'espère ? - Bien sûr.

translation.en: I know.
Dina just got her braces off, and her boobs suddenly arrived.
translation.fr: Dina n'a plus d'appareil et ses seins ont poussé.

translation.en: So, of course, golden boy Bradley Lewis takes notice.
translation.fr: Évidemment que Bradley Lewis l'a remarquée.

translation.en: So, what, are you guys, like,
suddenly girlfriend and boyfriend or something?
I mean, we haven't put a label on it yet, but...
translation.fr: On ne s'est pas mis d'étiquette.

translation.en: I really like him, okay?
This is the worst.
Yeah. Oh, yeah. No. Sure, I get it.
Just give him a chance.
Oh, come on, there's gotta be someone you sort of like. Just a little.
translation.fr: Il doit bien y avoir quelqu'un qui te plaît, rien qu'un peu.

translation.en: I don't know. I just guess I haven't really thought about it.
translation.fr: Je ne me suis jamais vraiment posé la question.

translation.en: Well, think about it.
And then maybe we can all go to homecoming together, like a double date thing.
translation.fr: Peut-être qu'on pourra aller au bal tous les quatre, en couples.

translation.en: - Hey, babe. - Hey!
Sorry I'm late.
- All good, babe. -
Ugh. They both call each other babe. Kill me right now.
translation.fr: Ils s'appellent bébé. Je veux mourir.

translation.en: Hey, Syd.
Do you think your mom could hook us up with some burgers?
translation.fr: Ta mère pourrait nous préparer des burgers ?

translation.en: They're just so great here.
Huh. She's not working today.
I was just asking.
Okay.
Want a burger, Brad? Let's get a burger.
translation.fr: On va te commander un burger.

translation.en: I've got some cash.
- Yeah? - Yeah.
- Wanna share one, babe? - Yeah. Oh, ketchup.
translation.fr: - On partage ? - Oui. Et du ketchup.

translation.en: Help yourself.
So...
Dina's just great, isn't she?
Jesus, do you ever smile?
Not today.
So, what have we decided?
Whatever you want, babe.
- Please. Please stop. - You gotta try one of these fries.
- I wish you would just stop talking. -
Wipe that smug smile off his stupid, stupid face.
translation.fr: Et effacer ce sourire suffisant de ton visage débile.

translation.en: - Oh, shit. - Oh, my God.
Oh, fuck.
- Are you okay? - Wait. What?
Yeah, fine. Just give me a minute.
- Take a tissue. - Gimme a minute, all right?
translation.fr: Prends un mouchoir. Ça va passer.

translation.en: So, here's the deal.
Today, I almost convinced myself
that I made Bradley Lewis's nose bleed
translation.fr: que j'avais fait saigner Brad du nez

translation.en: with my mind.
Right.
Mostly, I just need to chill out more.
translation.fr: J'ai juste besoin de me détendre un peu.

translation.en: I am not losing my first and only very best friend ever.
translation.fr: Je ne perdrai pas ma première et unique meilleure amie.

translation.en: I'm happy for Dina,
and if dating Bradley Dickhead Lewis makes her happy,
translation.fr: Si sortir avec Brad le connard la rend heureuse,

translation.en: then I guess I'm okay with it.
Oh, hey, Syd!
Hey.
He lives down the street from me.
translation.fr: Il habite en bas de ma rue.

translation.en: Where I feel shitty about basically everything about myself,
translation.fr: Si moi, je suis mal dans ma peau,

translation.en: Stan is the master of zero fucks.
translation.fr: Stan n'en a rien à foutre de rien, lui.

translation.en: Oh, my leg fell asleep. One sec.
Can I walk with you?
Sure. Why not?
Cool.
Stan is kind of... weird.
You okay?
Shoes. Who needs 'em?
Uh... so, Bloodwitch, am I right?
What?
Bloodwitch. You like their music?
That's a... terrible name for a band.
translation.fr: C'est tout pourri comme nom de groupe.

translation.en: Nah. Perfect.
Bet they sound like shit.
Well, I mean, I have-- I have 'em on vinyl...
limited edition, gatefold and stuff,
translation.fr: en édition limitée, avec pochette double, si tu veux venir l'écouter.

translation.en: if you wanna... come over, and we can listen sometime.
translation.fr: avec pochette double, si tu veux venir l'écouter.

translation.en: We can get high.
I have never been high before.
Yeah, maybe.
I mean, you don't have to.
I was-- I was just, you know...
We-- You know, we live so close, and we've never really hung out before.
translation.fr: tu habites à côté et on n'a jamais traîné ensemble.

translation.en: Uh, no, I guess we haven't.
But, yeah. Uh, maybe we should.
translation.fr: Mais oui. Ça pourrait se faire.

translation.en: Yeah.
Cool. Uh...
Let me know.
What a world we live in, Sydney.
I live with my mom and little brother.
translation.fr: Je vis avec ma mère et mon frère.

translation.en: Sydney! Is that you?
Mom and I haven't been getting along lately.
translation.fr: Maman et moi, on ne s'entend pas.

translation.en: Nope. It's an axe murderer. Good thing you asked.
translation.fr: C'est un tueur sanguinaire. Pour info.

translation.en: Ha- ha! Very funny.
Hey. So apparently, Karen's dog ran through a screen door or something,
translation.fr: Il semblerait que le chien de Karen ait traversé une porte grillagée,

translation.en: so she had to go to an emergency vet.
translation.fr: et elle doit aller chez le vétérinaire.

translation.en: - Okay. - So I'm gonna pick up her shift tonight,
translation.fr: - Bon. - Je la remplace ce soir.

translation.en: which is fine 'cause I owe her two shifts from the time Liam ate all that cheese.
translation.fr: Je lui dois deux services de la fois où Liam s'est bâfré de fromage.

translation.en: Well, thanks for telling me your life story, Mom.
translation.fr: Merci de me raconter ta vie, maman.

translation.en: No. Wait, come back here. I'm not done yet. Eyes on me.
translation.fr: Reviens, je n'ai pas terminé. Regarde-moi.

translation.en: Okay. Question. Big question.
translation.fr: Alors, j'ai une question pour toi.

translation.en: Have you seen my stockings?
They were in the bathroom. They were hanging over the shower curtain?
translation.fr: Je les avais suspendus dans la salle de bains.

translation.en: Oh, sorry. I thought they were dirty.
- No, they were drying. - Well, I found them in the bathtub.
D-- Well, where are they? They're my last pair.
I sort of...
washed 'em.
Wait. In the washer?
Yeah, and I guess they sort of ended up in the dryer, so...
translation.fr: Oui et ils ont dû finir dans le sèche-linge.

translation.en: Oh, great.
Now I get to feel like sausage while I'm serving it.
translation.fr: Je me sentirai aussi saucissonnée que ce que je sers.

translation.en: You don't really have to wear 'em, do you? No one wears 'em anymore.
translation.fr: Tu n'es pas obligée. Plus personne n'en porte

translation.en: - Like, since the '90s. - Can you--
Can you just make sure that Liam does his homework and eats some dinner?
translation.fr: Tu peux t'assurer que Liam fasse ses devoirs et mange ?

translation.en: Isn't he old enough to make sure himself?
Sydney, can you just do something for me, anything, just once, without questioning?
translation.fr: Tu pourrais me rendre un simple service, rien qu'une fois sans poser de questions ?

translation.en: Here I thought I was being so charming.
Nope. Not even a little bit.
Really doesn't matter what we're talking about.
translation.fr: Peu importe les sujets de conversation.

translation.en: - - Mom and I could sit in silence
translation.fr: Peu importe les sujets de conversation. Maman et moi, on pourrait garder le silence,

translation.en: for the rest of our lives, and she'd still annoy the crap out of me.
translation.fr: Maman et moi, on pourrait garder le silence, qu'elle me taperait sur les nerfs.

translation.en: Hey, Goob. Done your homework yet?
translation.fr: Goob, tu as fait tes devoirs ?

translation.en: Hours ago.
Soon as I got home. What about you?
Uh... I'll get to it.
Come on, Syd. Mom says you have to work hard if you're gonna succeed.
translation.fr: Allez, Syd. Maman dit qu'il faut bosser dur pour réussir.

translation.en: Yeah, well, the plan's always been for me to sit back and watch you succeed, Goob.
translation.fr: Moi, j'ai prévu de te regarder réussir, Goob.

translation.en: Oh, hey, who knows?
Maybe one day, if you really work hard enough,
translation.fr: Un jour, si tu bosses assez dur,

translation.en: you get to be the one to pay for my funeral.
translation.fr: c'est toi qui paieras mon enterrement.

translation.en: - How was school today? - Well, um...
Richard Rynard punched Toby Gardner in the face,
translation.fr: Richard Rynard a frappé Toby Gardner

translation.en: and he got sent to Mr. Coffee's office.
translation.fr: et a été envoyé dans le bureau de M. Coffey.

translation.en: Oh, yeah?
Yup, and I think I might be next, so... I'm devising a plan. Check it out.
translation.fr: Oui, et je pense être le prochain, alors je prépare un plan. Regarde.

translation.en: Holy shit, Goob. Is that for you?
Yup. Designed it myself.
Breastplate, shin guards, spiked gloves...
But I'm not so sure about the helmet situation just yet,
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas sûr pour le casque.

translation.en: 'cause I don't wanna block my peripherals, you know, just in case.
translation.fr: Je veux pas bloquer ma vision périphérique, au cas où.

translation.en: It's really cool, man. It's some of your best work yet.
Yeah, it's basically my Mark One,
and the first suit's always the hardest to design,
translation.fr: C'est toujours le premier le plus difficile.

translation.en: so it's still a work in progress.
And, sorry, what was the plan again?
Well, I'm gonna build the suit and kick Richard Rynard's ass.
translation.fr: Je vais fabriquer ce costume et botter le cul de Richard.

translation.en: Oh. Vengeance.
Got it.
My family.
I guess we've never had a lot of money.
translation.fr: on n'a jamais trop eu d'argent.

translation.en: Like, every place we moved, and we've moved a lot,
translation.fr: Dans chaque ville où on a emménagé et on a beaucoup bougé,

translation.en: it's always some place like this.
It's like a lottery, I guess.
Some kids win big time the moment they're born.
translation.fr: Certains gagnent gros à la naissance.

translation.en: The rest of us,
we're all stuck with scratch- offs and bottle caps and shit.
translation.fr: il nous reste les jeux à gratter et le Bottle Cap challenge.

translation.en: - ♪ To destroy that feeling ♪ - Liam?
Yeah?
If Richard Rynard ever touches you...
before you get your suit built to kick his ass,
translation.fr: avant de lui botter le cul en costume,

translation.en: I'll pull his throat out...
with my bare hands right in front of Mr. Coffee.
translation.fr: à mains nues devant M. Coffey.

translation.en: Really?
Yeah. Yeah, like this.
- You are so weird. -
Yeah, I know.
Okay, so... confession.
translation.fr: Bon, c'est le moment des confidences.

translation.en: I started getting these zits on my thighs.
translation.fr: J'ai chopé des boutons sur les cuisses.

translation.en: - I am straight up disgusting. -
I've tried zit cream and soap and all sorts of junk.
translation.fr: J'ai essayé la crème pour l'acné, le savon, ce genre de trucs.

translation.en: Nothing helps.
- They're not even that fun to pop. -
translation.fr: Ils sont même pas marrants à percer.

translation.en: Stop!
It's probably just puberty.
I don't know.
So, Stanley Barber texted me.
translation.fr: Stanley Barber m'a envoyé un texto.

translation.en: - He made me listen to Bloodwitch. -
Sometimes at night, I want to touch myself,
translation.fr: Parfois, la nuit, j'ai envie de me tripoter,

translation.en: but I don't.
Peanut butter helps.
Millions have discovered the secret...
The later Mom gets home, the more wine she drinks.
translation.fr: Plus maman rentre tard, plus elle boit de vin.

translation.en: What are we watching?
Don't know.
We haven't talked about Dad since he killed himself in the basement.
translation.fr: On n'a pas parlé de papa depuis qu'il s'est suicidé au sous-sol.

translation.en: AC's broken.
The unit's probably just... overheated.
It's hot as balls in this house.
Open a window.
It's that heavy thing we're all too afraid to talk about.
translation.fr: C'est trop douloureux et on n'arrive pas à en parler.

translation.en: I got called in... to the counselor's office.
translation.fr: J'ai été convoquée dans le bureau de la psychologue.

translation.en: - Why? What did-- what did you do? - Nothing.
translation.fr: Tu as fait quoi ? Rien du tout.

translation.en: She just...
She wants me to have, like... an outlet or something.
translation.fr: Qu'elle veut que j'ai une sorte d'exutoire.

translation.en: An outlet for what?
Just, sometimes it feels like...
the people I love don't love me back.
translation.fr: que ceux que j'aime ne m'aiment pas.

translation.en: Well...
Maybe you're aiming too high, hon.
translation.fr: peut-être que tu vises trop haut.

translation.en: She's such a bitch sometimes.
Dad would have understood,
but he hung himself,
so I guess I'm on my own.
Sometimes I wonder why he did it,
translation.fr: Parfois, je me demande pourquoi il a fait ça.

translation.en: and why we never talk about it...
...and what the hell is going on with me.
Why sometimes I feel like I'm boiling inside.
translation.fr: Pourquoi parfois, j'ai l'impression que je vais exploser.

translation.en: 'Cause maybe...
...I am way more fucked up than I thought.
translation.fr: je suis bien plus atteinte que je le pensais.
